import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, Button, Modal} from 'react-bootstrap'; function DetailsModal(props){ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( {/* */} {/* {props.contact.first_name} {props.contact.last_name} Gender: {props.contact.gender} Email: {props.contact.email} Company: {props.contact.company} Phone: {props.contact.phone} */}

Jesse Couch

Digital Creative

 ); } export default DetailsModal;
